title: Beats - beat freq due to 2f-A and 2f-B

content.question: Beats of frequency <math alttext="f sub beat comma 1, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>beat,1</mtext></msub></math> arise when a wave of frequency <math alttext="f sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub></math> and a wave of frequency <math alttext="f sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub></math> interfere with each other. Beats of frequency <math alttext="f sub beat comma 2, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>beat,2</mtext></msub></math> arise when a wave of frequency <math alttext="2 f sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>f</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub></math> and a wave of frequency <math alttext="2 f sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>f</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub></math> interfere with each other. What is <math alttext="f sub beat comma 2, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>beat,2</mtext></msub></math> in terms of <math alttext="f sub beat comma 1, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>beat,1</mtext></msub></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="one half times f sub beat comma 1, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>beat,1</mtext></msub></math>
<math alttext="f sub beat comma 1, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>beat,1</mtext></msub></math>
<math alttext="2 f sub beat comma 1, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>beat,1</mtext></msub></math>
<math alttext="4 f sub beat comma 1, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>beat,1</mtext></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="2 f sub beat comma 1, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>beat,1</mtext></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
